I have a painful rash on my face, trunk, extremities, as well as on my nose and ears, and I'm also experiencing fever and joint pain.
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
I have been experiencing these symptoms for 5 days.

No, I do not have a history of similar symptoms in the past.

I deny having any known autoimmune diseases.
Do any of your family members have autoimmune diseases or similar symptoms?
I haven't mentioned any family history regarding autoimmune diseases or similar symptoms.
Final Diagnosis: Drug-induced lupus erythematosus
